Reviews.Title: “I'd stay again anytime”
Reviews.Author: GettinErDun
Reviews.Content: stayed march getaway wife booked online thru hotel website deal stay nights free opted junior suite cost boiled 165night hotel itslef nicely appointed staff valet checkin conceirge friendly courteous 30th floor vey quiet view nice liked city view night home bed super comfy dreamed larger somehow altho perfect size decent lg lcd tv swiveled bed bathroom elegant decent towels tub nice lacking tho 2 people unfortunately glass shower cleaned everyday night water provided stay faults altho somewhat minor opionion toilet flusher broken promptly fixed notice couch rug questionable stains knowing goes hotel didnt leave guesses ive left stain didnt affect stay honestly steam cleaning wouldnt hurt anyway location perfect access magnificent mile shopping rush street dining bus 2 blocks direction loop 10 minutes didnt eat restuarant cant comment bar food nor touch mini bar stay id stay city pleasent 3 days sofitel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Trip to Chicago!”
Reviews.Author: Kiki2014
Reviews.Content: trip city tough canceled flights couldnt happier sofitel checkin efficient warm suite ready helped ease minds starving putting luggage directly concierge desk katie time city carefully explained city layout attractions decided pizanos lunch loved recommendation dinner recommendations available day night whenever called desk bed comfortable bathroom luxurious overall staff times valet quick le bar relaxing fun definitely look forward staying sofitel

Reviews.Content: husband stayed sofitel 3 wedding anniversary location nicer staff top notch hotel front desk staff housekeeping valets wonderful bathroom lovely bed comfy huge closets bit tiny pack hotel chicago perfection
